alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 06 at 3:10AM EDT until October 07 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...DANGEROUS FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS FOR SOUTHEAST ALABAMA AND PARTS OF THE FLORIDA PANHANDLE SATURDAY AFTERNOON... The combination of breezy post-frontal northwesterly winds, critically low humidities, and very dry fuels with ongoing drought conditions will make for dangerous fire weather on Saturday. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR THE FLORIDA PANHANDLE, PORTIONS OF THE FLORIDA BIG BEND, AND SOUTHWEST GEORGIA... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 007, 008, 009, 010, 011, 012, 013, 108, and 112. * WIND...Northwest around 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...22 to 27 percent * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; Inland Bay; Jackson; North Walton; South Walton; Washington
